title: 135 Yesu, In Ma Jahoch Mar Chuny

lines: 1. Yesu, In ma Jahoch mar chuny,Rita gotieno kanindo;Bedi koda gotienoni,Nyaka piny chak oyawrena.
2. Ka pok anindo apariKaka ihera pile ka;Tich Satani aseyo chuth,In Nyasaye kende madalami.
3. Rita gotieno, godiechieng`,Ok dabed mangima mak In;Bedi koda ka piny olil,To daluor tho da onge In.
4. Kaa e nindo, Igwedha;Dhi koda ka ma adhiye;Pile kamano nyak` ibiOmo jogi moseyiei.
